years to reach Kentucky from the East. In 1775, Daniel Boone blazed a trail for 
the Transylvania Company from Fort Chiswell in Virginia through the 
Cumberland Gap into central Kentucky. .... After passing over the Cumberland 
Gap the Wilderness Road forked.
